metadata.title: CVE-2021-47251 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mac80211: fix skb length check in ieee80211_scan_rx()Replace hard-coded compile-time constants for header length checkwith dynamic determination based on the frame type. Otherwise, wehit a validation WARN_ON in cfg80211 later.[style fixes, reword commit message]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
